actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite Bite [Melee Attack, a Restrained Target]: 3 (d6) and pass [Will] or be cursed with Werewolf Lycanthropy. Claws [Melee Attack]: 2 (d4)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Bloodthirst: It is Berserk and Beings at or below half HP make Checks against it as if Vulnerable. Shapechanger: This is a form that a Humanlike cursed with lycanthropy can become when the curse takes hold. They revert automatically if they die.
